Description: Pale blue glazed composition shabti with dark blue detail: a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard and parallel hands in relief holding an adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the leg section is inscribed with five rows of indistinct Hieroglyphic text; back-pillar and plinth.
Condition: good but cracked at knee level
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Maj William Joseph Myers (?)
